mapper.select: select filename,address,location,filetype,filesize,isreg,deccompressfile from versionfiles a left join productversion b on a.versionid = b.versionid left join production c on c.productcode = b.productcode where b.versioncode > #{versionCode} and b.productcode = upper(#{productCode}) and c.productType = #{productType} order by a.createtime desc
